website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a K'NEX set that offers numerous building projects and pieces, this one is a good choice. The addition of the sturdy storage tub adds to its value.
pros: This set includes 618 pieces that will keep kids engaged for hours as they work on the 52 building ideas
Projects include a giraffe, windmill, fire truck, and many more fun concepts
Tough storage tub keeps pieces in place when not in use
cons: Some of the pieces don't seem very sturdy, and a few pieces were missing from some sets when they arrived

customer_reviews.title: My 42 year old can play with these for hours!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love? My 42 year old can play with these for hours! Unfortunately he's still working on sharing, but on the rare occasion he does, my 7, 5 year olds and 4 year old have a blast with them. I'll have to stock up on new kits because my 42 year old wants to super glue his creation permanently.
customer_reviews.author: RunningMom4

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son and I had a great time putting this golf cart together! The pieces came in a nice red tub perfect for storage. However we tried to get instructions for building some other cars and the instruction manual included was very difficult to understand. It told me to go to a certain website which was impossible to navigate and I wasn't able to find the car my son was hoping for. We built the golf cart just by looking at the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeRTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and storage container is a plus
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and storage container is a plus! Our 10 year old received these as a gift - wasn't sure he'd like them after years of building with Lego's - but he was able to put together the largest model his first try with minimal assistance just by following the booklet. We have now purchase a different set for the 7 yr old brother! Great alternative for kids for creative play and using their minds to build things on their own outside of the booklet as well.
customer_reviews.author: TiaAnder

customer_reviews.title: Great for cosplay and convenience
customer_reviews.text: I used these to build the internal structure for a very makeshift Torbjorn claw. If you're deliberate you can use them to make a pretty solid piece. But I've used them for all sorts of things in the past, one time as a kid I used them to suspend small surround speakers from an unfinished basement ceiling. K'nex are probably one of the most practical things I own.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: An outstanding toy and a great birthday/holiday gift!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding toy. Requires just the right blend of creativity and imagination without too much difficulty. Purchased for my 7 year old grandson for Xmas and he still plays with it on almost a daily basis. Makes 52 designated animals, vehicles, and assorted shapes and, with 600+ pieces, makes virtually anything else he can imagine. Simply a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: michaelpaul50

customer_reviews.title: Get them away from the TV and Game Console!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter because I got tired of hearing how BOORREEEEDD she was. We received them and she dug in, then began complaining how hard I was to build everything. The next day when she realized tv wasn't going on, it was no longer that hard to use her imagination and build cool stuff. Go figure....
customer_reviews.author: S.C

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The idea of making so many different configurations of these pieces are great but when ever piece breaks that you try to get together you become quickly frustrated. I'm disappointed in the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: mmsolutions

customer_reviews.title: and none of the gears have broken like this in all those years
customer_reviews.text: This set of K'nex seems to be cheaply made. When we try to separate the gears and rods, teeth break off of the gears. I have an older set of K'nex that have been played with for 20 years, and none of the gears have broken like this in all those years. I'm not sure how to fix this other than writing a poor review.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: A New Household Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old received these for Christmas. He is a serious lego lover but has taken to these new toys, as they build in a way different than legos do. my 6 year old daughter plays with them to. 3 months after Christmas and its still being played with so I consider that a success.
customer_reviews.author: April Laue

customer_reviews.title: Great to interact with your kids
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to build. He started with legos and has now found these and gets to build things such as airplanes. We set up the plane and he loves it! So between his excitement and being able to have the quality time with my son with this product, it was definitely worth every penny! I provided two pictures, one of the front of the plane and one of the rear.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGrows

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for kids and adults alike!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who loves this more, my five year old son or my thirty year old husband. They have spent hours and hours building things since Christmas day. The instructions are easy enough that my son can build on his own too. It's a great feature that you can go online and see a lot more plans and have more options of things to build too.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of building fun!
customer_reviews.text: We love this toy! I bought two for my boys as Christmas gifts. I love that it comes with detailed instructions on how to build certain things. This certain product comes with wheels, so you can build cars, tractors, trains, etc. I especially love that it comes with a container to put all the pieces back into. Days of fun and creative imagination in this red box!
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set specifically for my 5yo who loves to build and play with k'nex at school. Opened it apon arrival and quickly realized that the set we received was new with factory sealed bags but we were missing almost all of the sticks. We have many other brands such as Lego and Playmobil and we have never had issues of missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of buildable toys in a box
customer_reviews.text: So many pieces :) Chose these for our Grandkids ages 4 & 6. They instantly sat on the floor and started making things. Comes with a picture book. which helps. Company actually has an app you can download and enlarge on your phone or pad. Believe it or not both the grandkids know how to do that. They very much enjoy this
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to familiarize with. Not a multi-age group activity.
customer_reviews.text: Thought my grandson would really like these, so invested in a couple of sets. GS not enjoying as expected. Lots of new parts to keep track of. Requires level of concentration unavailable with younger kids wanting to participate. Back to Legos.
customer_reviews.author: Runoldhag2?

customer_reviews.title: Better value than Legos
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. I'm all for giving toys as gifts that inspire creativity, and was very happy with this purchase. In my opinion, these are a much better value than, say, Legos. I was very happy with the set for the price paid. Pieces snap together well, don't seem to break easily, and there are many ways to put them together. Recipient has played with them often.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L

customer_reviews.title: Good building toy
customer_reviews.text: Lots of tiny pieces, but it makes some nice structures. I like them better than Legos. The 5-year-old can look at the pictures and put together the easier models; the 7-year-old doesn't have the patience for that. The book has directions for a few models, and pictures of many. I think you can go to their website and print directions for the others, but you can also invent many of your own, and build some just from the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these things kept him entertained for hrs. But their just like leggos. Dont step on one you know what im talking about. So many small pices.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: this is a wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these sets for my 6 year old grandson for Christmas. Wasn't sure how they would be received, and turns out he loves building with K'NEX. We spent two days building sailboats, windmills, golf carts... . He was able to follow the diagrams. We had a fabulous time together. If your child/grandchild likes to build and problem solve, this is a wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.author: sluna

customer_reviews.title: Good for Younger Children Too
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler likes to play with this set. At a young age, he cannot build complicated models by himself, but he is able to snap pieces together, and he enjoys building his own designs, like various roads, long sticks, squares, etc., or even simple flowers for his mom. The set's box and pieces are well designed, and enclosed booklet + website provide an interesting selection of models to build. In general, our son likes to play with construction and block sets, and this one is one of his favorites. It's definitely a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: I expected my son (7) to really enjoy these. I have seen him playing with these ...
customer_reviews.text: I expected my son (7) to really enjoy these. I have seen him playing with these at his after school care program. I sat down to build with him and had hard time snapping them together. A few pieces snapped right off as we tried to put them together. They were played with for a few days and I haven't seen him play with them since. I thought it would be good to try a building toy that was different than Legos, but from here on I'll stick with Legos. Both my son and daughter (12) play with Legos daily.
customer_reviews.author: KDLP

customer_reviews.title: KNex are a lot of fun and perfect for 6-8 year old as the direction ...
customer_reviews.text: KNex are a lot of fun and perfect for 6-8 year old as the direction are very clear and accurate. Our sons were immediately able to build these on their own right away!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Berry

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Classic toy. Well packaged. Good starter set. Bought it for 5 yr old. It's something that even he can get into, and grow with.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Homer

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old LOVES
customer_reviews.text: We first bought the K'nex gears set for my 4 year old son, and he loved it so much we had to purchase another set. This one contains a lot more pieces, which really allows his imagination to run wild. The directions give you some fun models to build, but I really wish they would have included directions for all of the models pictured instead of making you download them online. All in all it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Valleygirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my nephew, he is still making stuff with it months later, could play with it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Olga D.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this toy 20 years ago as a kid and it's still great to tinker with now. Great plans to follow if you need inspiration but K'NEX are awesome on their own to just connect with no end game. It's nice being stronger now I can pop pieces off easier than when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: CWBaker

customer_reviews.title: Hours if fun
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my daughters busy for hours. They use there imaginations or follow included plans. We love the different sizes of K’nex in this set. Also love love love the tote and that the lid snaps on.
customer_reviews.author: Mama B

customer_reviews.title: This is a great gift for someone who has a big imagination and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for someone who has a big imagination and loves building things. It comes with a booklet of a few things you can build, but the majority of the instructions you have to find on the website that they give you. I wish they had more things to build!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: classic toy for 4-5 year olds and up.  quiet!
customer_reviews.text: These things rock. My 6 & 8 year olds have loved these for years. Wonderful set, well worth the money. They still play with them. Any kid that likes legos will like these, but these do some cool and different things. 90% of the time kids make their own inventions with them; 10% of the time they make something in the instruction booklet. Great tub to have around for kids to play with at any time. Also nice quiet toy!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Solid toy for kids who like to build
customer_reviews.text: Just like I remember from my childhood. My kids love to play with them. There are plenty of pieces to build different types of things. I got it for my four year old so he is not building anything super complicated but he is able to easily connect and disconnect the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Terrific choice
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful choice for kids -- such a wholesome and creative way for them to spend time either by themselves or together with others.
customer_reviews.author: yellowflower

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 9 year old nephew. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old nephew. He’s really into LEGO’s, but he wanted something that he could build more. He was a little upset at first because the instructions are not so laid out, but he loves the freedom he has now!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Klepperich

customer_reviews.title: Gramma Terri
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is turning 6 and this was on Moma`s approved list. Shopped around and this was a great price. He should be able to build some things now and more difficult things later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Knex and lego should nver be replaced with modern tech games
customer_reviews.author: Ako Si Andeng

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend them for sure
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 yr. old grandson and he loves building different things with it. He sits and build for hours and he can build them all by himself! It arrived on time and was a christmas present for him. I would recommend them for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and millions of options for making things. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: KristenO

customer_reviews.title: great teaching aid disguised as a toy
customer_reviews.text: grandson with aspergers & ADHD. TOTAL involvement for hours on end. Dont forget the batteries tho LOL. Next to lego's this is the best thing for boys or girls learning to reconnect with limited emotional skills. Also teaches sharing and allows children to feed off each others intellect and creativity. Wish I could give some to school for kiddo's. but small parts.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Edmundson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the K'nex in our household, and I bought this second set to add to what we already had. Was happy to see it came with different parts instead of just more of what we already had (from the 700+ pc set). I have just as much fun as my six year old does!
customer_reviews.author: Sci-Fi and Scary

customer_reviews.title: ... in the classroom for 5th graders - they absolutely love them. Nice to see they can be so ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the classroom for 5th graders - they absolutely love them. Nice to see they can be so creative and curios during a free time
customer_reviews.author: rhaab

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for imaginative kids!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves playing with these!! Great manipulatives, they help develop focus and increase imaginative play through innovation!!
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Its quite a big box so def you get your moneys worth. Lots of little pieces. But pretty cool to build with
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Zarovsky

customer_reviews.title: Love building the various models with the kiddos on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love building the various models with the kiddos on the weekends. Be sure to check out the Knex website for additional instruction sets!
customer_reviews.author: Burly Squid

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is really great. Instructions are easy to follow, with 52 models to choose from. The storage container is sturdy, which is a bonus. We purchased this as a gift and it turned out to be his favorite present, and spent the entire evening building. My 8 year old has a similar set and uses them for all kinds of inventions. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. Grossi

customer_reviews.title: Better than legos hands down.
customer_reviews.text: Buy this product before you consider purchasing legos. These are 10 times better.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Lego's, there are enough pieces for two 5 yo kids, just make sure you buy two 15 inch square building plates>lego building plates 15 x 15,
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Open Play at its best
customer_reviews.text: Nice set with clear instructions. My Lego-loving kid is happily creating from his imagination, which is a nice change from the Lego sets with a "right way" to build.
customer_reviews.author: M. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5 and really likes the set. The only thing is it brings just enough prices to buil each model so do t lose any or you won't be able to complete the models. Also the bin it came in is hard to find pieces in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My bird loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My parakeet loved these! I made him a nice swing set. Cheaper than buying parakeet ladders and swings!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Joel

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Parents don't love how they are left all over the house
customer_reviews.author: GoldenGal

customer_reviews.title: They enjoy building and playing together
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for a friend's toddler. They enjoy building and playing together. Works the right brain and hand/eye stuff.
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: WILL KEEP KIDS BUSY FOR HOURS
customer_reviews.text: NOTHING TO DISLIKE GRAND KIDS LOVE THEM WELL MADE GREAT FOR IMAGINATION
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P. Weisbruch

customer_reviews.title: Great activity for my AS students
customer_reviews.text: Great activity for my AS students. They love them so much that they become upset when I tell them to take it apart to make something else. This sale allowed me to buy 4 more kits, so no taking apart fabulous creations!
customer_reviews.author: Mrsmadhatter

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set, but the super tiny pieces are a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set, but the super tiny pieces are a bit of a pain. Kids have broken a few of the connectors and I don't remember my own sets being quite so fragile, but that was twenty years ago. Overall they're fine.
customer_reviews.author: WickedCatLady

customer_reviews.title: Here we go again.
customer_reviews.text: Second one.....received one as gift and with two boys, needed more parts. They love it! It's a great home school tool for break time when weather is bad. You'll be amazed just how smart your kids are after watching what they come up with. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: RJK

customer_reviews.title: Grabs the attention of my "busy" 7 year old, love them!
customer_reviews.text: These magical things keep my "spirited" 7 year old busy for long periods of time. He loves coming up with new "inventions" and I love watching him create. One of the best toys I've ever bought him, looking forward to expanding is K'NEX collection!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn from Oh Sweet Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my first sons knex set and was ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my first sons knex set and was rather dissipointed in how huge the box was and how few knex pieces there actually was.
customer_reviews.author: ebrown

customer_reviews.title: Set was short by 90 pieces!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter for Christmas. After not finding a couple pieces needed for one of the models I decided to just count the pieces...low and behold There are only 528 pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes making the different projects in the box, plays from time to time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and creative
customer_reviews.text: My grandson requested this for his birthday. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Denise G.

customer_reviews.title: I love how it sparks his imagination and he is able ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this set! I love how it sparks his imagination and he is able to follow the instructions and then tweak it how he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a before deal Christmas price
customer_reviews.text: Kiddos enjoyed them. They still play with them and we bought them at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: BlessedMamaof7

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these great deal for the amount and price. Has a little booklet on how to make some stuff too.
customer_reviews.author: djskooma

customer_reviews.title: Better than LEGO’s
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES his K’Nex! His imagination goes wild playing with these!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 year old grandson LOVED this. He's left it here with us because he wants us both to build something with him. Now how many little guys would WANT to do this with his grandparents??? <smile> Would use seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Kazcon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the grandson loves them and he is 6 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer girl

customer_reviews.title: K'Nex Model Building Set
customer_reviews.text: One of the best toys to express creativity. Comes with models to build. Maybe this will encourage someone to be an engineer.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy W.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids like to play with these, just wish the instructions were easier for them to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: A tub of wonder waiting to be built!
customer_reviews.text: Gave to grandson at Christmas and he began building items right away. Love the container it came in. His uncle also got him a k'Nex set and grandson able to put those pieces in the tub as well. Kept him busy for hours every day and he still taking apart and building!
customer_reviews.author: Windy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool set, not all 52 models are in the mag, but you can get them online.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the kids and adults. Had one piece break but lots of fun building.
customer_reviews.author: Erica W

customer_reviews.title: This was a Christmas gift for grandson. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for grandson. I have ordered them for him more than once and he just can't get enough of them.
customer_reviews.author: V. L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift with Multiple Uses
customer_reviews.text: Great holiday gift, grandson loved, plus he can make an abundance of items with this, not just one!
customer_reviews.author: DonnaMarie Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Even Grandma uses them. 😏
customer_reviews.text: Both my grand kids (4 & 7) love these. We'll, ok, I love them to. I find them stimulating for the creative part in us. They are great and easy to work with. They both get so excited when they have created something new. I put the small parts in zip lock bags, easier to keep track of. Both kids have been taught well....not to put anything in their mouths. We just ordered a new set of educational ones.
customer_reviews.author: DTM

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kids for Christmas and they love it! They can build whatever their imagination allows them to build. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Caldera

customer_reviews.title: Disconnect the electronics and reconnect the brain
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set. Our kids were inspired when they saw a K'nex demo at the Space and Rocket center. Great toy to get them off of the electronics for a while and use their hands and brain to work.
customer_reviews.author: T Wright

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Grandklids were thrilled to use this to make several different projects. Only one part broke so far from their use.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene M Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Both my 8 and 5 year old sons love building with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good price fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good price fast shipping. My son loves to spend time. I believe these toys are essential for the kids in the development of motor and hand skills as well as working on projects. I only wish they included an engine in the deal.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good product but grandson a little young. Will hold onto till older.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and just annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Just FYI this set only includes a handful of instructions. You have to print the rest out- it's a lot of paper and ink, and just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: gertrudepem

customer_reviews.title: The tub they come in makes for easy storage. Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves these. The tub they come in makes for easy storage. Great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Denise McChesney

customer_reviews.title: My kids are enjoying these right now. They are ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids are enjoying these right now. They are 7. The instructions are a bit more challenging to follow than Legos so it may take a little getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: K'nex are just the best! It is one of my favorite gifts to ...
customer_reviews.text: K'nex are just the best! It is one of my favorite gifts to give to children of any age. Good quality product and, as it pertains to creativity, the possibilities are truly endless.
customer_reviews.author: Kalliope Jones

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves building things so this was the perfect gift. He just turned 5 so it was ...
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves building things so this was the perfect gift. He just turned 5 so it was totally age appropriate. Only downside would be that to get the other models to build you have to log online. Would have been easier just to include a large book. Still at hit after Christmas and going strong!
customer_reviews.author: lola5605

customer_reviews.title: There is a happy kid somewhere!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toy for a good price. Bought for a seasonal toy drive. There is a happy kid somewhere!
customer_reviews.author: JPS

customer_reviews.title: Great  for the creative child
customer_reviews.text: My grandson had a blast building this huge plane. He looks forward to creating more wonderful things.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Hellenbrecht

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: My 7 & 9 year old loved these and they have never cared for anything lego or building related!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki C

customer_reviews.title: I have played with K'Nex since i was a kid ...
customer_reviews.text: I have played with K'Nex since i was a kid, now my daughter loves them! only thing i would change is the number of pieces included LOL there are never enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep kids busy!
customer_reviews.text: My kids enjoy these(ages 5 and 8). The directions are easy to follow to build the projects shown, but mine have also built their own things(swords and guns) to pretend fight with.
customer_reviews.author: amanda f.

customer_reviews.title: Good Set of Knex
customer_reviews.text: Good Set of Knex, however some of the more fun instructions are not included in the guide provided. You have to go online to print them yourself.
customer_reviews.author: KPeterson

customer_reviews.title: Toy for all ages
customer_reviews.text: We have three generations of people playing with this at the dining room table and enjoy the variety of objects you can me. The pieces are colorful and durable.
customer_reviews.author: LuvLobster53

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and take apart
customer_reviews.text: Neat toys with a lot of different options to build. Easy to put together and take apart.
customer_reviews.author: Randy C.

customer_reviews.title: They are 4 and 5 years old and absolutely love this. They have already created a few things ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephews as a Christmas present. They are 4 and 5 years old and absolutely love this. They have already created a few things with it plus it helps get their creative juices flowing. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Face

customer_reviews.title: Great for the "builders" of the family
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 13 year old sister. She's a builder so adding this to her collection was a must for Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the money. Makes 52 different models and our grandson loved it,
customer_reviews.author: MTRanch

customer_reviews.title: Super fun! My son finds patterns online to build ...
customer_reviews.text: Super fun! My son finds patterns online to build & loves putting working parts together. For sure something to supervise with a younger child.
customer_reviews.author: J & LM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My nephew only had good things to say about the K'nex. Very good for older children.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy! Very stimulating for the mind
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toy! Very stimulating for the mind. Good for both children and their parents! In addition you will not be bored, as their are a variety of models to build.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: Great open ended toy
customer_reviews.text: Great open ended toy, good quality, my 6yr old son and husband are always making crazy and imaginative objects. A must have for a learning environment.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Tilby

customer_reviews.title: Building time
customer_reviews.text: This set has been keeping my 9 year old grandson and I busy for hours building things to the plans supplied, and then making our own changes.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

product_meta.title: K’NEX – 52 Model Building Set – 618 Pieces – Ages 7+ Engineering Education Toy (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description:
Encourage your children’s creativity and imagination with the highly stimulating K’NEX 52 Model Building Set! With 618 classic and micro K’NEX pieces, this building toy for ages 7 and up gives children an outlet to learn and enjoy themselves at the same time.

The K’NEX building system is composed of colorful plastic rods and connectors that snap together with a simple “click”! These pieces can be combined together to create real working vehicles, moving structures, and just about anything your child can imagine. With 52 building ideas, the included illustrated instructional booklet guides your little engineers in constructing truly amazing creations. You’ll be astounded at how your youngsters construct a fire truck with an extended ladder, a military tank, a windmill, and a four-legged animal with just plastic rods and connectors. Your kids can assemble a different K’NEX idea each week! In the process, this educational engineering toy will put your child on a path towards a better understanding of STEAM (science, technology, engineer, arts, and math) subjects.

A sturdy included box allows you to clean up and store the set’s plastic pieces easily. With this portable storage container, you can bring K’NEX anywhere. Let your children have fun building and sharing their creations at playdates and family gatherings.

The K’NEX 52 Model Building Set also fosters kids’ growth by strengthening hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, problem-solving skills, and spatial awareness. It is proudly made in America and was tested to the strictest quality and safety standards, ensuring that children will enjoy a hassle-free playtime experience. 

Start them young. Encourage your children’s creativity and brain development with the K’NEX 52 Model Building Set today!



BRAND STORY
By K'Nex
feature_bullets: OVER 600 ASSORTED PIECES – The K’NEX 52 Model Building Set contains 618 micro and classic parts and pieces that feature vibrant colors and premium-quality construction. The package includes rods and connectors. These parts can snap together to create rounded and cornered shapes. Pieces can be mixed and matched to turn whatever a child imagines into a true-to-life creation.

52 BUILDING IDEAS – Let your children enjoy creating 52 different model ideas with this colorful set. Parts can be used to make a fire truck with an extended ladder, a military tank, a windmill, and a giraffe. Your kids will enjoy checking off each week’s building idea in the included calendar.

CONVENIENT STORAGE – You never need to worry about scattered pieces, thanks to the handy storage tub. For hassle-free packing and storing, the K’NEX 52 Model Building Set includes a red plastic container. All micro and classic K’NEX parts can be placed in this portable plastic tub. This makes transporting the set easy, so you can bring K’NEX on your family outings and keep the little ones entertained. Packaging may vary.

EASY TO USE – K’NEX 52 Model Building Set comes with an easy-to-follow instruction manual to guide children through their building conquests. The manual comes with construction ideas ranging from beginner to advanced levels of difficulty. Unleash your youngsters’ creativity by letting them create a variety of structures on their own. This building set is recommended for children ages 7 and up.

STEAMagination: It’s the connection of STEAM (science, technology, engineering, arts & math) with a child’s natural curiosity and creativity and it powers the fun of each and every K’NEX building set. Building with K’NEX puts children on a path towards a fundamental understanding of STEAM/STEM subjects.

DEVELOPMENTAL BENEFITS: K’NEX supports key areas of a child’s developmental growth. As they click the different parts together and discover how the building system works, they’re strengthening hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, problem-solving skills, spatial awareness and exercising their imagination!

COMMITMENT TO QUALITY: K’NEX rods and connectors are responsibly made in America at a landfill-free, zero-waste green manufacturing facility in Hatfield, Pennsylvania. We test to the strictest quality and safety standards, ensuring that your child has a successful, trouble-free building experience.

PARTS GUARANTEE: Broken part? Missing part? If you find yourself in need of a replacement for any reason, just give us a call! We’ll get you what you need so that your child can get back to building as soon as possible.
